page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content:
I went around our infant class and I asked 4 people about clubs. The first person I interviewed is {SUZIE COLE,}she is 6\ she goes to piano lessons. It costs her Â£15:00 a term it takes place on Monday at 5:00 pm. There are three other girls that go and she never gets bored. She's been for 8 lessons, she doesn't have any kind of membership. Her teacher is Mrs Hellson.
the second person .... {EMILY WESTERN,}she is 7 she goes to swimming club. It costs her 30p to get in.It is held on Monday at 5:25pm there are 4 other people in her group. She gets there by car .Her membership is a card, she's been there for 3 lessons and her teacher is Mrs Hunns. {By John Stewart-Hook.
